channel.title: Adding owner and donator icons/crowns?
channel.description:
How can I add owner crowns and donator crowns. I'd need to 1.) sync playerRights 3 for the owner crown 2.) I'm not sure how I'd add a donator crown.. :\
I'm on a 317.. Delta base? It's PKJad Scape source.
